Who has opened a door for you and where did it lead?
Where were you happiest to arrive and why?
Who do you know who is wise?
What was your favourite ever piece of clothing and why?
Who have you learned most from and what did they teach you?
What advice would you give to your 10 year old self?
Remember your childhood bedroom, what can you see and hear out of the window?
What is something nice you can do for someone else today?
When did something unexpected happen that was better than what you expected?
What is priceless about this moment?
